Comment.Language: The Gospel response is not chanted.

Text.Language: Picwma nem pic~nof n~tak: pe p~,w e~bol n~te nennobi: nem ]dia~y/k/ m~beri: e~takt/ic n~nekmay/t/c.
Your Body and Your Blood, are the forgiveness of our sins, and the new covenant, that You gave to Your disciples.
جسدك ودمك: هما لغفران خطايانا: وللعهد الجديد: الذى أعطيته لتلاميذك
Anerp~emp~sa m~pis~s/n n~te n~wnq: eyrenouwm e~bol n~q/tf: e~te vai pe p~cwma m~V]: nem pefc~nof n~a~l/yinoc.
We are made worthy to eat, of the Tree of Life, which is the Body of God, and His true Blood.
فاستحققنا شجرة الحياه: لنأكل منها: الذى هو جسد الله: ودمه الحقيقى.
